video.title: Destination Truth
video.synopsis: Host Josh Gates goes to exotic locations to investigate supranational mysteries and other unexplained phenomena, to prove, or refute, their veracity.

episodes.synopsis: The team conducts a paranormal investigation of the legendary city of Pompeii. / The crew investigates claims of a monstrous animal in Africa.
episodes.title: Poltergeists of Pompeii / Nandi Beast

episodes.synopsis: At an 800-year-old Cambodian temple, locals have had violent encounters with apparitions. / The team investigates a dragon-like creature in Canada.
episodes.title: Spirits of Angkor Wat / Canadian Lake Monster

episodes.synopsis: Josh and the team check out claims of ghostly miners in an abandoned Japanese town. / Tanzanian warriors fear an elusive predatory creature.
episodes.title: Ghosts of Haboro / Mngwa

episodes.synopsis: The team goes to Micronesia for an undersea exploration of a Japanese World War II naval base. / The team seeks out a mythical sea monster in Japan.
episodes.title: Ghost Fleet / Japanese River Monster

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates Bigfoot, whose existence is supported by years of folklore as well as new data suggesting an unidentified ancestral primate.
episodes.title: Siberian Snowman

episodes.synopsis: According to legend, the spirits of 60,000 warriors roam eastern Africa's Menengai Crater. / The team seeks out the Kalanoro beast of Madagascar.
episodes.title: Ghosts of Menengai Crater / Kalanoro

episodes.synopsis: It is believed spirits of former rulers remain in the ancient Nan Madol ruins. / The team looks for a legend whose seductive powers induce insanity.
episodes.title: Haunted Island Ruins / Moroccan Succubus

episodes.synopsis: The team goes to Madagascar in search of an alleged monster bat that has incited a national frenzy. / The team hunts for zombie-like ghosts in Guam.
episodes.title: Guam Zombies / Fangalobolo

episodes.synopsis: Broadcasted live, this special episode finds Josh and the team setting out to find the "Irish angel of death," better known as the banshee.
episodes.title: Live from Ireland: The Search for the Banshee Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Once a brutal prison, an island off the coast of Panama is said to be haunted. / The team treks to Argentina to seek out the mysterious Ucumar beast.
episodes.title: Haunted Island Prison / Ucumar

episodes.synopsis: Disembodied spirits in a deserted Namibian diamond-mining town challenge Josh and the team. / The team investigates reports of a hairless animal.
episodes.title: Sandstorm Spirits / Cerro Azul Monster

episodes.synopsis: The team races across Thailand to chase a giant ghost. / Some farmers in Namibia have lost livestock to a predator that drains the animals' blood.
episodes.title: Jungle Temple Ghosts / Namibian Night Stalker

episodes.synopsis: A Thai temple claims to be have two creatures that are half plant and half animal. / The crew heads to Cyprus to investigate a massive sea creature.
episodes.title: Thai Tree People / Aiya Napa Monster

episodes.synopsis: The team braves the elements in Antarctica, where strange phenomena occurring around abandoned research stations has stumped scientists.
episodes.title: Ghosts of Antarctica
